CHANGES
*******

0.1.2 (2008-07-11)
==================

Bug fixes
---------

- Pin down zope.testing version due to incompatibilities with
  ``plone.recipe.zop2install``.


0.1.1 (2008-07-11)
==================

Bug fixes
---------

- Fixed imports according to new z3c.testsetup release.



0.1 (2008-03-05)
================

Feature changes
---------------

- Initial release, factored out from z3c.testsetup-dev
